name: Dybbuk. Episode 0
description:
In Jewish Folklore, Dybbuk is a malevolent non physical deity that is believed to be the dislocated soul of a human being that committed a lot of sins. This malicious spirit disturbs sinful human beings in the most petrifying way possible.

The main character appears to be the victim of Dybbuk. In the preface to the game, your goal is to escape from the haunted hospital.

You are the autopsist, who finishes his regular night shift in the hospital.
At first glance, there is nothing unusual about him living the shift last.

However, he was locked down by the unwanted guest. .

Your mission is escape from the cursed hospital by utilizing various types of objects and clues.

Why did Dybbuk chose to intrude into the main character's life? This will be revealed in the next part of the game, which will be released on PC
